name: Beansight
tag_list: prediction, future, community, social, expert, credibility
overview:
Beansight is a website where people can share their insights about the future. These insights could let the user prove their expertness in their favorite fields. Beansightl brings all brains together in order to have the best forecasts on what is going to happen.

Here the way it works: People share insights. Users are invited to vote (if they feel that the prediction is going to happen or not). If the prediction was good then all people who voted for it gain points. The others loose points. These points make the users weight more when they take a position.

Beansight system of predictions reveal the experts. If one has the knowledge and the analysis skills to make good predictions, he’ll be able to show it to the whole community.

offices.address1: Silicon Sentier - Le Camping, Attn: Beansight
